title: Company Overview and Business Model
content:
## Tesla, Inc. (TSLA): Business Overview

### Executive Summary
Tesla, Inc. is a leading Auto Manufacturers company headquartered in Austin, TX.
The company operates in the Consumer Cyclical sector and employs approximately 125,665 people globally
[Source: company_profile].

### Business Segments
The company operates through the following segments:
- **Auto Manufacturers - Core** (75% of revenue)
- **Services** (12% of revenue)
- **Accessories** (8% of revenue)
- **Other** (5% of revenue)
